name: Escape from Titan
description:
You find yourself alone on Titan, a voice in your head telling you to find a way to  escape before ....

This was for a game jam for programmers who can not draw so the art is programmer art :p

We build this for the game jam https://itch.io/jam/i-cant-draw-but-want-to-make-a-game-again it was just for some fun.  Have somthing smaller to do and to experiment with a few things. (More on what we were trying and exploring on the devblogs)

We had a lot of fun making it and we hope you have some fun playing it.
